cosc345.app.model

Class PlayableNote

  • java.lang.Object
    • cosc345.app.lib.Note
      • cosc345.app.model.PlayableNote
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.media.AudioTrack.OnPlaybackPositionUpdateListener, Playable, java.lang.Comparable<Note>

    public class PlayableNote
extends Note
implements Playable, android.media.AudioTrack.OnPlaybackPositionUpdateListener
    Extends the note class such that a note can be played back as audio.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayableNote

        public PlayableNote(double frequency,
                    Note.NoteLength noteLength,
                    boolean useDottedLength)
        Create a musical note based on a frequency.
        Parameters:
        frequency - the frequency (in Hertz) to use.
        noteLength - the length of the note (e.g. crotchet).
        useDottedLength - whether or not the note length is dotted or not.

      • PlayableNote

        public PlayableNote(java.lang.String name)

      • PlayableNote

        public PlayableNote(java.lang.String name,
                    Note.NoteLength noteLength,
                    boolean useDottedLength)
        Create a musical note from a string.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the note that follows the format (Note Letter)[#|b](Octave). For example a note name may look like: A#3 or Db4.
        noteLength - the length of the note (e.g. crotchet).
        useDottedLength - whether or not the note length is dotted or not.

      • PlayableNote

        public PlayableNote(Note note)
        Create a playable note where the note is copy of another Note object.
        Parameters:
        note - the Note object to be copied.
